beach.p1: The Shield of the Sea team is committed to raising awareness and making museums fun, and invites you to take part in the Wake experience.
beach.p3: It's an interactive, immersive experience designed to raise awareness of the ocean's many problems through games!
beach.p4: So why a game? What form does it take?
beach.p5: Let us introduce you to Marco and Polo!

sea.p1: We met Marco & Polo during a short stay in Dauville.
sea.p2: We were touched by their stories and their problems!
sea.p3: So we wanted to do something to help them fight back. So how did Wake come about?

discovery.p1: It all begins on February 27, 2023, when we meet Marco and Polo.
discovery.p2: The question quickly arose: "How can we raise awareness of the ocean's many problems?"
discovery.p3: We're looking, we're thinking and, above all, we don't want to show off. So we set off on the crazy project of combining new technologies and gaming!
discovery.p4: The project is off and running!

design.p1: First we had to think up the game, so that you'd like it and have a good time at the museum
design.p2: Then we tried to recreate Marco and Polo as faithfully as possible (and it wasn't easy)
design.p3: Finally came the hard part of development, you know all that indigestible code, and well that's Wake too, a unique experience to share with friends and discover new technologies.

inauguration.p1: This is it! It's finally time for the inauguration of Wake!
inauguration.p2: We are happy and proud to present this project with so much meaning and value for us!
inauguration.p3: Marco and Polo have already tried it out, and they were "AMAZED"
inauguration.p4: So when are you coming over?

find-us.h2: Do you want to find us?

where.p1: So don't worry! No need for snorkels and fins, we're right here!
